tool_description: This API shows all the latest news about the Coronavirus in Portugal.
name: Portugal Covid-19 News
title: Portugal Covid-19 News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to check for individual sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://portugal-covid-19-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/sol"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "portugal-covid-19-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://portugal-covid-19-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "portugal-covid-19-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all the Covid-19 News
api_list.description: You can get all the latest news from Portugal in this endpoint.
